data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea engelmannii (Engelmann spruce) from sample MEDI-72

Exposition N, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Anstehender Hartk. m. Silik. Morän. , Tree line 2280 m, av. Tree height 22 m, Tree cover 20%, Shrub cover 20%, Herb cover 60%, Vegatation type: Homogen, Film number: 731A
